name: Ensure Security Defaults is disabled on Azure AD
Ensure that Azure AD authentication methods policies are configured correctly
Ensure that Microsoft Azure Management is limited to administrative users
Ensure Sign-in to Active Directory accounts is limited to administrative users only
Ensure Microsoft Authenticator is configured to protect against MFA fatigue
Ensure that Identity Protection high-risk sign-ins policies are configured
Ensure a Conditional Access policy exists requiring MFA for all users
Ensure a Conditional Access policy requires MFA for Azure Management
Ensure a Conditional Access policy requires MFA for risky sign-ins
Ensure a Conditional Access policy exists for risky users
Ensure a Conditional Access policy requires MFA for Windows Azure Service Management API
Ensure a Managed Device is required for MFA registration
Ensure a Compliant Device is required for MFA via Conditional Access
Ensure sign-in frequency is enabled and browser sessions are not persistent
Ensure a Conditional Access policy blocks access from outside the country
Ensure the Common Attachment Types Filter is enabled
Ensure DMARC Records for all Exchange Online domains are published
Ensure the Safe Links policy is enabled for Microsoft Teams
Ensure that Safe Attachments for SharePoint, OneDrive and Teams is enabled
Ensure Microsoft Defender for Office 365 protection for SharePoint/OneDrive/Teams is enabled
Ensure inbound anti-spam policies do not contain allowed domains
Ensure outbound anti-spam message limits are in place
Ensure Exchange Online Spam Policies are set to notify administrators
Ensure notifications for internal users sending malware is enabled
Ensure Safe Attachments policy is enabled
Ensure Safe Links for Office Applications is Enabled
Ensure Exchange Online Spam Policies are set to notify administrators
Ensure that an anti-phishing policy has been created
Ensure that DKIM is enabled for all Exchange Online Domains
Ensure that SPF records are published for all Exchange Domains
Ensure all forms of mail forwarding are blocked and/or disabled
Ensure Safe Links for Office Applications is Enabled
Ensure the URL scanning for Links is enabled for Teams
Ensure Safe Links click-through protection is enforced
Ensure Safe Links scanning of emails for malicious URLs is enabled
Ensure Administrative accounts do not have mailboxes
Ensure that between two and four global admins are designated
Ensure emergency access admin accounts are maintained
Ensure Sign-in to non-admin accounts is enabled and audited
Ensure Microsoft 365 audit log search is Enabled
Ensure DLP policies are enabled for Microsoft Teams
Ensure user consent to apps is not allowed
Ensure third party integrated applications are not allowed
Ensure collaboration invitations are sent to allowed domains only
Ensure password hash sync is enabled for hybrid deployments
Ensure the option to stay signed in is hidden
Ensure LinkedIn account connections are disabled
Ensure that users cannot register devices
Ensure users cannot create security groups
Ensure Intune Device Management is enabled
Ensure mobile device management policies require advanced security configurations
Ensure the device platform for all devices is managed
Ensure Bitlocker is enabled for all Windows and non-Mac devices
Ensure Local Administrator Password Solution is enabled
Ensure users are restricted from recovering BitLocker keys
Ensure user consent to apps accessing company data on their behalf is not allowed
Ensure the admin consent workflow is enabled
Ensure only organisationally managed/approved public groups exist
Ensure that guest user access is restricted
Ensure guest invites are only allowed from specific admin roles
Ensure Privileged Identity Management is used to manage role assignments
Ensure Microsoft Authenticator is used as authentication method
Ensure a managed device is required to register security information
Ensure sign-in frequency for Intune Enrollment is set to "Every time"
Ensure a Conditional Access policy requires hybrid Azure AD joined device
Ensure MFA is enabled for all users in administrative roles
Enable Conditional Access policies to block legacy authentication
Ensure Sign-in frequency is enabled and browser sessions are not persistent for Administrative users
Ensure the Entra ID Risky sign-ins policy is enabled
Ensure user risk policy is enabled
Ensure the Entra ID Authentication methods policy is configured
Ensure Entra ID authentication methods are limited to MFA-capable authenticators
Ensure a Conditional Access policy exists for registered and compliant devices
Ensure that Entra ID MFA is enabled for all users
Ensure custom banned passwords lists are used
Ensure password protection is enabled for on-prem Active Directory
Ensure that number matching is enabled for Microsoft Authenticator
Ensure additional context is enabled for Microsoft Authenticator
Ensure hardware OATH tokens or FIDO2 security keys are enabled
Ensure temporary access pass is correctly configured
Ensure Self-Service Password Reset is properly configured
Ensure MFA is enabled for all Global Administrators
Ensure a minimum of two users are designated as Global Administrators
Ensure Privileged Identity Management is used to manage access to Azure resources
Ensure no Global Administrators are synced from on-premises Active Directory
Ensure Emergency Access admin accounts are not assigned permanent roles
Ensure the customer lockbox feature is enabled
Ensure Modern Authentication for Exchange Online is enabled
Ensure all mail transport rules do not whitelist specific domains
Ensure Calendar details sharing with external users is disabled
Ensure that DKIM is enabled for all Exchange Online Domains
Ensure the report message feature is enabled
Ensure the Exchange Online Azure AD OAuth app is enabled
Ensure basic authentication for Exchange Online is disabled
Ensure Exchange Online email public folders are not used
Ensure auto-forwarding rules are disabled or monitored
Ensure the connection filter IP allow list is empty
Ensure Exchange Online email junk filtering safe senders list does not allow bypass
Ensure SharePoint and OneDrive integration with Azure AD B2B is enabled
Ensure SharePoint and OneDrive require managed devices for syncing
Ensure SharePoint Online access is restricted by IP address
Ensure OneDrive content is not shared directly with external guests from unmanaged devices
Ensure external content sharing is restricted
Ensure SharePoint and OneDrive default sharing link type is set to internal
Ensure SharePoint online external user sharing is restricted
Ensure link sharing expiration is configured for anonymous links
Ensure SharePoint online external user sharing is restricted to guest accounts only
Ensure SharePoint infected files are disallowed for download
Ensure only organizational accounts are allowed to share content externally
Ensure modern authentication for SharePoint applications is required
Ensure SharePoint Online external user sharing is restricted
Ensure anonymous users cannot start meetings in Microsoft Teams
Ensure only people in the same organisation can bypass the lobby
Ensure meeting chat does not allow anonymous users
Ensure screen sharing does not allow anonymous users
Ensure external file sharing in Teams is enabled for only approved cloud storage services
Ensure communication with unmanaged Teams accounts is disabled
Ensure Microsoft Teams is configured to prevent external access
Ensure anonymous users and dial-in callers cannot start a meeting
Ensure Teams is restricted from automatically granting guest access
Ensure Teams meeting lobbies are enabled for all attendees
Ensure Teams meeting "Who can present?" policy is configured properly
Ensure Teams meeting recording is disabled for external participants
Ensure users cannot send emails to a channel email address
Ensure Teams is configured to restrict who can schedule meetings
Ensure only organizers and co-organizers can present in Teams meetings
Ensure dial-in users are placed in a lobby before joining meetings
Ensure users with Teams messaging permissions cannot edit and delete sent messages
Ensure Microsoft 365 audit log search is enabled
Ensure sensitivity labels are applied to M365 Groups and Teams
Ensure sensitivity labels are configured for SharePoint Online
Ensure retention policies are configured for sensitive data types
Ensure DLP policies are created and used
Ensure Data Loss Prevention policies are configured for sensitive data
Ensure Microsoft Purview is used for insider risk management
Ensure DLP policies are enabled for Microsoft Teams
Ensure SharePoint Online Information Protection settings are enabled
Ensure sensitivity labels are configured for Teams
Ensure communication compliance policies exist
Ensure the audit log retention is 180 days or greater
